Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Grand Nightlife Pack. This pack contains 4 items: 1 Super Rare or better bonus item, 1 Rare or better bonus item, 1 Fortuitous Dye Kit, and 1 Major or Minor XP Boost. This pack contains boxes of complete Armor sets, Mounts, Weapons, Color Crystals and Toys from the Nightlife Shipment.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Nightlife Pack. This pack contains 4 items: 1 Super Rare or better bonus item, 1 Rare or better bonus item, 1 Expanded Dye Kit, and 1 Major or Minor XP Boost. This pack contains boxes of complete Armor sets, Mounts, Weapons, Color Crystals or Toys from the Nightlife Shipment.

Ability.Name: Collar
Ability.Description: Once applied, the collared beast obeys basic commands, including directing the beast to a home location.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Outer Rim Platinum Pack. This pack contains 1 select Super Rare or better Bonus Item from the Outer Rim Explorer's Packs.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Wild Space Platinum Pack. This pack contains 1 select Super Rare or better Bonus Item from the Wild Space Explorer's Packs.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Strongholds Pack. Contains one Stronghold Decoration, drawn randomly from the Stronghold, Shadow, and Decoration Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Grand Weapons Pack. Contains one Weapon, drawn randomly from the Starfighter, Stronghold, and Shadow Packs found on the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Gree Hypergate
Ability.Description: You regenerate health and your class' energy pool while harnessing the power of the Gree.

Ability.Name: Gladatorial Nexu
Ability.Description:
Summons the Gladatorial Nexu creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Landslide Assault Speeder
Ability.Description:
Activates the Landslide Assault Speeder, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill. Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Vectron Ranger
Ability.Description:
Activates the Vectron Ranger, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill. Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%
